pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides a useful set of utilities for interacting with a cloud: cloud-localds - create a disk for cloud-init ec2metadata - query and display AWS EC2 metadata mount-image-callback - mount a file to a temporary mount point resize-part-image - resize a partition and filesystem on it to a new size ubuntu-cloudimage-query - get the latest Ubuntu AWS AMI vcs-run - obtain a repository and execute a command write-mime-multipart - utilty for creating mime-multipart files
